page.title: 16Whitefield Farm,Ashey
page.content: Mr and Mrs Callaway own 189 acres of land.They keep{cows,pigs and chickens. They have 39 calves altogether: 16 beef and 21 dairy.They are all hand reared. They have 14 chickens,one of which is a cockerel. Mrs Callaway lets them roam around the drive. Mrs Callaway keeps 8 pigs, 7 sows and 1 boar called Daly.Mrs Callaway tames them like pets. They have 156 cows altogether.These are milked twice a day.Each cow gives about 35 litres a day.Mrs Callaway designed a way of keeping the cows in a large shed called a cubicle house.It is a way of keeping the cows in their own cube.They sleep there at night. Mrs Callaway does not allow{hunting} on her land because she disapproves of it.
